p: The primary mode of ZIKV transmission is through the bite of Aedes mosquitos, although recent studies suggest that sexual transmission is also a possibility ( Foy et al., 2011, Musso et al., 2015). In fact, recent studies suggest that the virus can persist for long periods in the testes of infected mice leading to destruction of tissue resulting in sterility ( Govero et al., 2016, Ma et al., 2016). What made the recent ZIKV epidemic alarming is its association with neurological illness such as Guillain-Barr√© syndrome in the French Polynesia and microcephaly in fetus and newborns (reviewed in ( Retallack et al., 2016)) in the epidemic in Brazil and USA.
